text:
Lindsey is from Florida and has worked in online and print media. Her happy place is Michaels craft store.

Hollywood actor Chris Evans is known for his portrayal of Steve Rogers, also known as Captain America, from the wildly popular Marvel movies.

Advertisement

While Chris has no problem getting shirtless for many of his roles and showing off his killer six-pack, the actor admits that he doesn’t find himself all that attractive!

In a recent interview with Thirst Aid Kit by BuzzFeed, Chris was asked to talk about the moment he realized he was hot. Instead of giving his answer, the actor surprisingly admitted he hasn’t had that realization yet.

“I still feel like I’m just trying to pull a fast one over on people,” the actor replied.

Advertisement

“You don’t know what I look like first thing in the morning. It’s rough!”

The action star went on to say that as a teen he had “a really bumpy road” in terms of how he looked. “I think like most of us, we still feel like that no matter what,” the 36-year-old actor explained. “That was probably one of the roughest chapters of my life. And so I think — for most people — you kind of stay in that suspended state.”

This isn’t the first time Chris has been open and honest about struggles in his life. He recently sat down for an interview to discuss his anxiety and how that almost kept him from accepting the role of Captain America. Watch the video below to learn more.
